name: extreme-speed
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.
flavor_text.platinum: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user charges the foe at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.
